name: Used Cars Dealer
description:
Be the master of your garage, and make money in it. Buy used cars with a low price, then restore them and sell them for a better price! Polish and paint them to fresh, clean and wash the car body, replace tails, tires and glass. You will have fun using tools like grinders, paint guns and torque wrenches!

You are not just repairing an old car, but make it regain a new life! You are a car master as well!

The game features: 
- A great number of car 3d models
- Fix all problems occurred on a vehicle
- Upgrade your car garage so that you can obtain more profit
- Unlock new fixing skills as your play
- Amazing graphics and Realistic physics

You can become an excellent car mechanic and a wealthy shopkeeper in the game.
